title: Short-Term Intensive Course Based on Multimodal Instructional Methods for Strengthening Nursing Delegation Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning using digital devices, combining online modules with face-to-face simulations to strengthen practical competencies related to nursing delegation

learning_goals: Learners can explain legal and ethical standards of nursing delegation with 90% accuracy.
Learners demonstrate effective communication skills in three or more role-playing scenarios using the SBAR (Situation-Background-Assessment-Recommendation) technique.
Learners make appropriate task delegation decisions with 85% or higher accuracy after assessing patient conditions in virtual simulation environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
